QuestData.Title: Welcome at Our Fire
QuestData.Description:
You have fought alongside our hunters and earned a place at our fire.
Our khan is at our hunting post in the swamp, readying our upcoming caravan. I will notify her of your arrival and purpose.
Surely you can find your way on your own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Scout Tomul at Timberstep Outpost.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Scout Tomul at Timberstep Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: You outsiders seem to have a habit of meddling in the affairs of others.
